column5: This course is your gateway to a career in real estate, the most diverse, fascinating and dynamic asset class.OverviewWho is it for?A Bayes master's degree is your gateway to a real estate career. You may be a recent graduate with any previous degree, have a job in finance or real estate but wish to upgrade your skills and/or knowledge of real estate, or are intending a career switch from another industry.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
